title: Harvest Vegetarian Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Raw, Buffet, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Fusion, Austrian
description: Vegetarian bistro with family atmosphere, operating since 2012. Offers a buffet of international as well western cuisine and desserts. Saturday and Sunday brunch til 4pm. Accepts reservations. Public transit: U2, Linie 2, bus 5a.
